note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Depressive disorders prevalence vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Estimated share of people who have  [depressive disorders](#dod:depressive_disorders), whether or not they were diagnosed, based on representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
